content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Purpose\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training is being provided to certain individuals who perform, supervise or otherwise support activities that involve Walgreens retail and specialty pharmacies, or government billing. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This course will help you understand the need for compliance, as well as the severe consequences of noncompliance. You will also gain a better understanding of applicable federal health care regulations and compliance obligations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training is mandatory. You must complete the full 60- minute training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":49400,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/20d3968f-bf88-4f07-a285-1c308ac890d0/Capture2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/20d3968f-bf88-4f07-a285-1c308ac890d0/Capture2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture2.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"20d3968f-bf88-4f07-a285-1c308ac890d0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":304,\"height\":230},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This course will provide links to written policies and procedures that outline the requirements you must satisfy in order to perform your job duties in a compliant manner. As always, consult your manager, the Compliance and Ethics Office, or Legal if you have any questions or concerns.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our confidential Compliance and Ethics hotline (855-WAG-CODE) or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.wba.ethicspoint.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"wba.ethicspoint.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is also available for you to report concerns.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
